titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period of Care Decision Made Date - Description

div.p: An NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period Of Care Decision Made Date is an ACTIVITY DATE TIME.

An NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period Of Care Decision Made Date is the date the outcome of the decision following the review of a NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period of Care was made.
